content.new:
Steps to reproduce:

* Start gzserver and gzclient separately

* On the `World` tab click on `Scene`

* Edit `ambient` and `background` properties

Either

* Close gzclient, start a new gzclient. The Scene properties went back to default.

Or
content.old:
Steps to reproduce:

* Start gzserver and gzclient separately

* On the `World` tab click on `Scene`

* Edit `ambient` and `background` properties

* Close gzclient, start a new gzclient. The Scene properties went back to default.

title.new: Scene properties are not altered on server side or SDF file
title.old: Scene properties are not altered on server side

issue.title: Scene properties are not altered on server side or SDF file
